entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
